name: Brumalek
movement: 30 ft. walking, 20 ft. burrowing, 20 ft. climbing
description: The Brumalek is a small and agile beast with enhanced mobility through burrowing and climbing, and notable features like a thunderous howl and pack tactics.
memorable: Its ability to deaf opponents with a howl while remaining agile makes it a unique threat in combat.
goals: Typically hunts in packs, using stealthy movements to ambush prey.
relations: Often found in groups with other Brumaleks, enhancing their effectiveness through Pack Tactics.
environment: Primarily found in snowy regions and environments with earth and snow.
strengths: Immunity to thunder damage and resistance to cold damage makes it effective in cold climates.
weaknesses: Low strength and charisma scores limit its physical power and social interactions.
attacks: Uses a melee attack called Headbutt, dealing bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Reverberating Howl, a cone attack that deafens foes while dealing thunder damage.
skills: Has a decent perception skill of +1.
additional_information: Can burrow through nonmagical snow without disturbing it.
Advantages on attack rolls if allies are nearby.
Ability to use Skittish action to enhance mobility.
Deafening howl audible from 300 feet away.
test_queries: small agile beast with a deafening howl
creature that burrows through snow stealthily
pack tactics monster with thunder damage
skirmisher that can climb and burrow
